attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MY FARTHER FAUGHT A WAR FOR THE FREEDOM OF THIS COUNTRY! WHY ARE WE GIVING SO MUCH AWAY?.
DO WE HAVE PLANS TO CONSTRUCT PIG FARMS OR BACCON BUTY SHOPS NEXT DOOR TO THESE MOSQUES!! OR WOULD THAT BE INSESITIVE TO THE MINORITY!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
